title: Riots new live chat feature for contacting them.
body: Just wanted to say this is a pretty rad feature, regardless of what the issue is, its nice not having to submit an email and wait 3-14 days depending on how many player support requests there are, I just had an issue I was able to resolve with a quick chat with Rioter "IronSights" and I hope you guys keep this feature for any and all account issues, as the rioter said it is still under testing.

replies.body: No problem! This post was also made so that hopefully others will know about it and can resolve their issues with you guys with this awesome new feature!
